item.description:
Sorry guys, I'm going to reschedule this for March 24th just in case people have any difficulty making it to this one. Hopefully we won't have snow then.

Hello all,

Who doesn't like pizza? Being a transplant from California myself, I thought it might be fun to head out to the local CPK and just have a casual dinner. If you haven't met anyone in this meetup group, come out for a drink. Don't feel pressured to stay if you don't want to.

However, if you are coming, please RSVP at least 1 day before the event so I can be sure how many are coming. Also, please be sure you can attend before RSVPing "Yes".

Looking forward to seeing people there!
item.name: California & Pizza & Fun!
